name: Rioters
description:
Rioters - is a strategic multiplayer role-playing roguelike game for two or more players. The game was created under the impression of Vampire Survivors, only made multiplayer. Each warrior in the game can be both a hero and a combat unit that can be armed and improved skills. Before the battle, assemble a squad, choose magic and aura and start a PVE or PVP game.

Features

+100 Heroes

+Multiplayer real-time

+65 maigics and specials

+1000 weapons, armours

Supports 10 languages: English, Arabic, Chinese, Russian, Spanish, French, German, Turkish, Portuguese, Vietnamese
